channel.title: Class Question (Fool)
channel.description:
I decided to post this because i asked boslof, and he didn't know. So im wondering if this is actually something that can happen.
If a fool is reaped, but he is executed the next day. Does it still count as a win for the fool? :thinking:

item.title: Class Question (Fool)
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
I’d think so- but I’m pretty sure the only way to know for 100% sure is to be a Fool and become reaped, and have the lobby execute you You could organize a private lobby to do this testing.

Read full topic
